group_1.textLeft: No thanks to you! I had to fight Familiars.
Plus you're late!
You didn't do that on purpose, did you?

group_1.textRight: Anyway, I was surprised you contacted me.
That's a very unusual behavior for you.

group_1.textLeft: I had something I wanted to ask you...
Remember what you said the other day?
About that crazy Magical Girl who's called@the "[textRed:Sleepwalking Ghost]"?
Is she really here in Mitakihara?

group_1.textRight: Oh, her. She's already in Mitakihara City.

group_1.textLeft: Where in the city is she?
Is she after someone here, too?
Do you know who she's after?

group_1.textRight: I go and check on her regularly.
But I don't end up getting much information.
I do think it'll be a similar case to what@happened in other regions.
And if so, I don't think you'll be targeted@by her.

group_1.textLeft: O-of course not!
I haven't done anything wrong!
She only attacks bad people, right?

group_1.textRight: Are you worried about someone else, then?
Perhaps that man who you're always thinking@about?

group_1.textLeft: How'd you know that? You wouldn't@understand, you don't even have emotions...
People are often jealous of him...of Sho.
He's often misunderstood, so I wanted to@make sure he's all right.
I also heard rumors.
There are rumors about people who may be@targeted.
I'm just a little worried about him.

group_1.textRight: Lately, you've been prioritizing him over@everything else.
You haven't even been doing your primary@duty as a Magical Girl, hunting Witches.
I almost wish something would happen to him.

group_1.textLeft: Don't say things like that!
I just finished defeating some Familiars.
And I hunted a Witch just last week!
I've just been really busy!

group_1.textRight: You last hunted a Witch 10 days and 13@hours ago.

group_1.textLeft: I'll go!
I'll go, right after I'm finished working!
I just can't go right now!

group_1.textRight: It's always the same with you...
I'll look into who the [textRed:Sleepwalking Ghost] is@targeting.

group_1.textLeft: Fine.
